title: 26 25 26 "Stranded""Zeff and Sanji's Dream! The Illusory All Blue!"Transliteration: "Zefu to Sanji no Yume Maboroshi no Ōruburū" (Japanese:ゼフとサンジの夢·幻のオールブルー) Mitsuru Shimada Munehisa Sakai 713.1 May 24, 2000(2000-05-24)[49] March 19, 2005[50]
transformers_text: 26 25 26 Stranded Zef f and Sanji's Dream The Illusory All Blue Transliteration Zef u to Sanji no Yume Ma boro shi no rub ur Japanese Mitsuru Shimada M une his a Sakai 713 1 May 24 2000 2000 05 24 49 March 19 2005 50 With Zef f held captive by G in Sanji has no choice but to take Pearl's hits He reveals that he worked on a cruise ship that Zef f attacked and when a storm hit the two were the only survivors Zef f sacrificed his leg to save Sanji and gave Sanji food as both shared the same dream of finding the legendary ocean All Blue supposedly a place where the four seas meet and all the world's sea life intermingles No longer able to fight with his legs and be a pirate Zef f founded the Bara tie Sanji claims that he will defend the Bara tie with his life and an enraged Luffy responds by attacking the ship's porch with Gum Gum Axe
